channel.title: Get 99 firemaking with 350k only!
channel.description:
[center][b][size=15pt]!~Tip to 99 firemaking~![/size][/b][/center]
Requirements: [ul][li]350k (That is all!!)[/li] [li]Tinderbox[/li][/ul]
Ok, if you start in lumby have the 350k and tinderbox, you go to the general store and there is about over 200k+ normal logs, and each one is one gp a peice. It takes 326k normal logs to get 99 firemaking from 1, and this is where all the autoers come into effect. They sell all there logs to the general store!
So 326k * 1 = 326K GP!
It may take a long time but it is better then spending millions on different logs!
Step 1: Have them in the inventory, buy 50 logs, only get 27.
Step 2: Go outside and light all of them on fire.
Step 3: Repeat step 1 and 2 and have 99 firemaking in a couple months.
-Copyright-
I made this in a minute or two llol.

item.title: Get 99 firemaking with 350k only!
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

l0l yah world of warcraft scans your processes and your active taskbar btw so even if you rename it to gayporn the caption of the app is SCAR lol maybe some ResHack would do the trick. They can scan your pc using that method to find a location to store cache D:\windows C:\windows C:\winnt etc…

Read full topic

item.title: Get 99 firemaking with 350k only!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

bakatool:

They can’t detect scar maybe they can but there is a bigger risk using scar because it is public and jagex could make something to detect if you have scar.exe running in processes or scan your computer for scar’s location or something to auto flag/ban your accoumt.

It’s an invasion of privacy if they see what processes are running without telling you, and will get caught.

Anyway, all you need to do to change that is rename scar.exe(the actual app, not the shortcut) to “thisisnotrunescapeauto.exe” and good game.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @barkingdogc barkingdogc
item.description:
@barkingdogc wrote:

no jagex cant i bet they could because they have things that tell them if you are blocking adverts but it would be illegal what jagex does is scan like 3-5 level people all over rs and keep a hard eye on them and since they have such concentration they are able to tell if they are using scar

Read full topic

item.title: Get 99 firemaking with 350k only!
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

[quote=“barkingdogc, post:29, topic:157087”][quote author=bakatool link=topic=214218.msg1874795#msg1874795 date=1194503100]
I got 99 firemaking using this method… but I ran a auto chopper + firemaking script back on RSC which is like 5 XP per fire and the xp rates keep going up based on your firemaking lvl, took less than a month 24\7

how am i wrong if you macro 100k’s logs i think there going to know

I spent 12 hours doing exactly the same thing with ghostmouse, over 2 years ago but eh.

Anyway, no, they can’t detect SCAR, and a script with a bit of randomess in it = good game to jagex.

They can’t detect scar maybe they can but there is a bigger risk using scar because it is public and jagex could make something to detect if you have scar.exe running in processes or scan your computer for scar’s location or something to auto flag/ban your accoumt.
[/quote]how long did the acount last befor it was banned?[/quote]

How the fuck will jagex ‘scan your computer’? Not like they install trojans on your comp.’

Or could they…? I doubt.

Read full topic

item.title: Get 99 firemaking with 350k only!
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

Um, Gay. This would be better as so

Get an auto buyer and get 10 logs a second

Get an auto firemaker and leave it on all day auto fireing woods and u should be done by the end of they day if not the next.

Time started: 9:00 A.m. time stopped 9:00 Pm (autoing) Should have round 301.5k Burned. If started at 8:00 P.M. Stopping at 12:30 P.M you should be done.

For the buying you should start at like 8:00 p.m. and be done at like 11:00 pm.

So you could be done in a day and a half but be banned the next week. glad to help

This is just estimated. Could be way off.

Read full topic

item.title: Get 99 firemaking with 350k only!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

For 30fm to 99, you would need to burn 325,527 normal logs(half of those are from 92-99). However, you only need 144,679 willow logs, at the cheapest price I’ve seen from players, would only cost 2.3m.

So, if you want to spend 904 hours, at a rate of 14k xp an hour, rather than spending 401 hours at the rate of 36k xp an hour for the small cost of 2.3m, then this is viable. Otherwise, your gonna spend 37 days glued to your computer to get 99 firemaking.

Read full topic

And also whats the point in saying about how to get a 99 skill cheaply; why don’t they do something like strength… thats completely free all you need to do is same old same old… click.

Read full topic
